channel.title: TimelessPK - Spawn - VPS hosted - log-in & PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z94Em.png[/img][/CENTER]
Hello, TimelessPK is a log in and pk server where you can spawn items you desire. Although it is a spawn server, you cannot spawn all items. This is because we want players to work for their items and not get bored instantly. These items can be obtained only by player killing or killing certain bosses. This creates an eco in a way. We try our best to bring new content almost everyday. We hope to see you online!
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.timelesspk.info"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.timelesspk.info/index.php?action=forum"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"timelesspk.info/Timeless.jar"]Desktop Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.timelesspk.info/index.php?action=page;sa=Webclient"]Webclient[/URL]
We will be changing to .com domain soon. The website and the forums are still being worked on.[/CENTER]
[center][size=18pt]Decent switches[/size] [IMG]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/clip00531.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/leech2.png[/img] Teleport to clan wars and challenge opposing clans [IMG]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/cwars.png[/img] Your pking rank upgrades as you gain kills [IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/9013/625a5cc78566459aaf3a102.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YhyC4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SloZ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/9611/5a98e1f3b1434b0f971ca81.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EyVxE.png[/img] New bosses will be added asap [IMG]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/bork.png[/img] [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/3227/66facdde344540c3b558cb7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L2qS5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YYj55.png[/img] More images are to be added
Credits: Sanity Moe Anyone else who I may have forgotten[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Minor updates made as of now:[/size][/center] [center]-PVP loot system fixed. You know have a random chance to receive PVP gear or statuettes with your loot. -PKP issue resolved, you can now gain pk points from killing other players unlike before -Special attack bar now contains percentages -Bork area is now a multi combat zone -Fixed certain armor requirements -Fixed donator icon issue (credits to Damon) -Several glitches/flaws have been fixed -VPS Updated -New shop prices (more realistic for our player amount at the moment) -Several small bug fixes -Bandos armour and dragonfire shield now removed from spawning and added as a common Bork drop ( -Will be moved to a different boss) -Ice Strykewyrms now have a better drop ratio now for Korasi's Sword/Ring of Vigour -Yell colors not as ugly and disorganized as before -You now receive a message when you have either 50% or 100% special attack -New bosses added -More items removed from spawn list[/center]

item.title: TimelessPK - Spawn - VPS hosted - log-in & PK
item.dc:creator: @HydrationPK HydrationPK
item.description:
@HydrationPK wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Hello, TimelessPK is a log in and pk server where you can spawn items you desire. Although it is a spawn server, you cannot spawn all items. This is because we want players to work for their items and not get bored instantly. These items can be obtained only by player killing or killing certain bosses. This creates an eco in a way. We try our best to bring new content almost everyday. We hope to see you online!

[CENTER]Website
Forums
Desktop Client
Webclient

We will be changing to .com domain soon.
The website and the forums are still being worked on.[/CENTER]

[center][size=18pt]Decent switches[/size]


Teleport to clan wars and challenge opposing clans

Your pking rank upgrades as you gain kills





New bosses will be added asap


L2qS5.png767×502

YYj55.png765×502

More images are to be added

Credits:
Sanity
Moe
Anyone else who I may have forgotten[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Minor updates made as of now:[/size][/center]
[center]-PVP loot system fixed. You know have a random chance to receive PVP gear or statuettes with your loot.
-PKP issue resolved, you can now gain pk points from killing other players unlike before
-Special attack bar now contains percentages
-Bork area is now a multi combat zone
-Fixed certain armor requirements
-Fixed donator icon issue (credits to Damon)
-Several glitches/flaws have been fixed
-VPS Updated
-New shop prices (more realistic for our player amount at the moment)
-Several small bug fixes
-Bandos armour and dragonfire shield now removed from spawning and added as a common Bork drop ( -Will be moved to a different boss)
-Ice Strykewyrms now have a better drop ratio now for Korasi’s Sword/Ring of Vigour
-Yell colors not as ugly and disorganized as before
-You now receive a message when you have either 50% or 100% special attack
-New bosses added
-More items removed from spawn list[/center]

Read full topic
